abstract: Seventeen of New York City's most well-known hotels have signed on with NYC Carbon Challenge, program aimed at reducing greenhouse gas emissions; initial group of properties making pledge, owning some 11,000 guest rooms, will cut emissions in their buildings by 30 percent over next decade; city's buildings, including hotels, account for around 75 percent of emissions in five boroughs.

headline.print_headline: New York Hotels Make a Green Pledge
headline.main: New York Hotels Make a Green Pledge

keywords.value: Waldorf Astoria New York (Manhattan, NY, Hotel)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Seventeen New York City hotels have pledged to serve the environment by joining the NYC Carbon Challenge.
lead_paragraph: Seventeen New York City hotels have pledged to serve the environment by joining the NYC Carbon Challenge.
